channel.title: PJ Teh Writes
channel.description: PJ Teh's attempt to create a seamless writing system via Cryogen & Github pages

item.title: why another blog
item.description: It might seem quite strange: why am I creating another blog for myself when I already have a personal blog here?Part of this is due to the feeling of discomfort I get from the friction of using Wordpress as a CMS.
item.author: PJ Teh
